text: Nyasaye abachelasilia Abasatsa babili, mulala khubo ni omusumba omurumwa owuli hasi womwami wuwe, owulanyala shiosi shiosi tawe; nende ulia owakhwakaba omukabo kurula khwifwe, mana naye arusinjia khumukabo oko mubwifisi nende mubwang’ang’u, koo bakhaba nashilala? Ifuma yoosi ni ya Nyasaye halali abanji mubo shibamanyile tawe
